course_description: This course offers practical conversation instruction based on short films. Thematic in nature, this course covers all tenses, advanced grammatical structures, and a wide range of vocabulary. Offered on demand. Placement into 202, 205, or completion of SPAN_OX 202 is required.
sections: Class Nbr: 3393, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: M. Davis, Status: Open
